sections.title: Verse 1
content: Into Your sanctuary we come, O Lord,
With hearts prepared and spirits bowed;
For all the blessings that surround.

sections.title: Chorus
content: You are the light that never fades,
The truth that sets the captive free;
We lay our burdens at Your feet,
And find new life through Calvary.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: We come to worship and adore,
To seek Your mercy and Your grace;
May we go forth with hearts renewed,
To serve You all our days.
